name: CoCo Ladder
description:
Shoemaker's Last proudly presents: CoCo Ladder!

Inspired by the classic eighties CP/M game by Yahoo Software.

You are just a Lad... trapped in a maze.  Might as well explore the dark corridors looking for riches and glory!  But beware of falling rocks, called Der Rocks.  And look out for fire pits!  Can you survive all six levels?  If you do, the Der Rocks get faster...

CoCo Ladder is 100% machine code and runs on a CoCo 1, 2 or 3 with at least 64K of memory.  

Thanks to CoCo legends Rick Adams and Steve Bjork for sharing their multi-voice music and random number generator routines, respectively.

Download the virtual disk from the link below.  Mount or insert the disk, and type LOADM"LADDER" to load, followed by EXEC to start laddering!
